name: Let me tell you a story
name_original: Let me tell you a story
description:
You're in a ride-share on your way home on a rainy night. The trip will only take a few minutes but the driver has stories to tell you to pass the time. You aren't really wanting to talk but it's raining and you're already in the car so you can make some vague noises in response. It's not much but it will change what the driver says.

There are five stories in total to hear.

Content Warning

Contains frequent coarse language
